subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Toner, the Connecticut athletic director from 1969 to 1987, hired two top coaches, Jim Calhoun and Geno Auriemma, and was instrumental in advancing college sports for women.
snippet: Toner, the Connecticut athletic director from 1969 to 1987, hired two top coaches, Jim Calhoun and Geno Auriemma, and was instrumental in advancing college sports for women.
